queries.query: INSERT INTO user (nickname, email, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
UPDATE user SET nickname = ?, updated_at = COALESCE(updated_at, NOW()) WHERE email = ?
UPDATE user SET is_deleted = 1, deleted_at = COALESCE(deleted_at, NOW()) WHERE email = ? AND password = ?

SELECT t.task_id, c.title AS category_title, u.nickname, t.contents, t.created_at, t.status FROM task t JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id JOIN user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.is_deleted = 0

SELECT t.task_id, t.category_id, t.contents, t.created_at, t.status, c.title AS category_title, u.nickname AS nickname FROM task t JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id JOIN user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.user_id = ? AND t.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM task INNER JOIN category ON task.category_id = category.category_id WHERE task.category_id = ?
INSERT INTO task (user_id, category_id, contents) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
UPDATE task SET status = "COMPLETED", updated_at = COALESCE(updated_at, NOW()) WHERE user_id = ? AND task_id = ?

SELECT t.task_id, c.title AS category_title, u.nickname, t.contents, t.created_at, t.status FROM task t JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id JOIN user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.user_id = ? AND t.status = 'IN_PROGRESS' AND t.is_deleted = 0
UPDATE task SET is_deleted = 1, deleted_at = COALESCE(deleted_at, NOW()) WHERE task_id = ? AND user_id = ?
